posts.post_title: Turkey Red Chief Bender HOF PSA 3
posts.post_content: Here is a nice Turkey Red of Chief Bender that I have to sell for 450.00. Very nice color with the original sheen. No creases . Some wear to the border and rounded corners got this one a PSA 3. Checklist back. Paypal OK
